title: Espresso Martini
description: A rich and creamy cocktail with a kick of caffeine, perfect for coffee lovers.
instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice.
Shake vigorously for 15-20 seconds.
Strain into a chilled martini glass.
Garnish with coffee beans.
notes: Use freshly brewed espresso for the best flavor.
Adjust the sweetness with simple syrup to taste.

title: Pistachio Spritz
description: A refreshing spritz with a nutty twist, perfect for summer afternoons.
instructions: Fill a glass with ice.
Add pistachio syrup and top with Prosecco and soda water.
Garnish with fresh mint leaves.
notes: For a stronger pistachio flavor, use pistachio-infused gin.
Experiment with different herbs for garnish.

title: Classic Elegance
description: A timeless cocktail that combines the crispness of gin with the subtle sweetness of vermouth.
instructions: Add gin, vermouth, and lemon juice to a shaker with ice.
Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a lemon twist.
notes: Use high-quality gin for the best flavor.
Adjust the vermouth to taste for a drier or sweeter cocktail.

title: Long Floral Twist
description: A floral and refreshing cocktail that combines the sweetness of elderflower with the herbal notes of gin.
instructions: Fill a glass with ice.
Add gin and elderflower liqueur.
Top with tonic water and stir gently.
Garnish with cucumber slices.
notes: Use fresh cucumber for garnish to enhance the flavor.
Adjust the sweetness with more or less elderflower liqueur.

title: Rumtini
description: A tropical twist on the classic martini, combining the flavors of rum, pineapple, and coconut.
instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice.
Shake well and strain into a chilled martini glass.
Garnish with a pineapple slice and cherry.
notes: Use fresh pineapple juice for the best flavor.
Adjust the sweetness with more or less coconut cream.

title: Elephant
description: A rich and creamy cocktail that combines the exotic flavors of Amarula with the depth of sweet vermouth and cacao bitters.
instructions: Add Amarula, sweet vermouth, and cacao bitters to a mixing glass with ice.
Stir gently until well chilled.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with an orange twist.
notes: Use high-quality Amarula for the best flavor.
Adjust the sweetness with more or less sweet vermouth.

title: Jasmine and Peach Martini
description: A floral and fruity cocktail that combines the sweetness of peach with the delicate aroma of jasmine.
instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice.
Shake well and strain into a chilled martini glass.
Garnish with a peach slice and jasmine flower.
notes: Use fresh jasmine flowers for garnish if available.
Adjust the sweetness with more or less jasmine syrup.

title: Spicy Margarita

Add tequila, lime juice, and agave syrup with ice.
Shake well and strain into a salt-rimmed glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a lime wheel and jalape単o slice.
notes: Adjust the spiciness by adding more or less jalape単o.

title: Lavender Collins
description: A refreshing and floral cocktail that combines the herbal notes of gin with the delicate flavor of lavender.
instructions: Add gin, lavender syrup, and lemon juice to a shaker with ice.
Shake well and strain into a glass filled with ice.
Top with soda water and garnish with a sprig of lavender.
notes: Use culinary-grade lavender for the syrup.
Adjust the sweetness with more or less lavender syrup.
